Headline: #115 Pullman/115th Temporary Reroute near 115th/Halsted
ShortDescription: 115 Pullman/115th buses temp. rerouted NB: 115th, Halsted, 119th, Ashland and 115th SB: 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Ashland and 115th: near 115th/Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#115 Pullman/115th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near 115th/Halsted, due to street blockage near115th/Halsted.

Northbound buses will operate via 115th, Halsted, 119th, Wentworth and 115th including the normal route streets.

Southbound buses will operate via 115th, Wentworth, 119th, Ashland and 115th.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Reroute at Division/Wells
ShortDescription: 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Orleans, Chicago, LaSalle, & Division: due to police activity near Division/Wells.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Division, Orleans, Chicago, LaSalle, then resume their normal route on Division: due to police activity near Division/Wells.

Allow extra travel time.
